Title: Relates to limited-profit housing companies
Summary: Relates to limited-profit housing companies; authorizes certain companies to pay dividends or interest in excess of six percent per annum; relates to the dissolution of certain rental housing companies.
LawCode: Amd ยง28, add ยง35-a, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to limited-profit housing companies in a city with a population of one million or more
